entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: A potions master and a strict teacher at Hogwarts who is known for being arrogant.

relationships.description: Harry knows how it feels to be humiliated in the middle of a circle of onlookers, just like Snape did when his father taunted him.
Harry's father was every bit as arrogant as Snape has always told him.
